projects.title: E-commerce Cart Bug Fix
projects.description: Need help fixing a persistent shopping cart issue where items disappear after page refresh. Must have experience with React state management and local storage.

projects.title: React Dashboard Development
projects.description: Looking for a developer to build a comprehensive admin dashboard with charts, tables, and user management features. Must use React and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: REST API with Node.js
projects.description: Build a scalable REST API using Express.js and MongoDB. Should include authentication, rate limiting, and proper error handling.

projects.title: Mobile App UI Redesign
projects.description: Complete UI/UX redesign for a React Native fitness tracking app. Need modern, clean design with smooth animations.

projects.title: Database Optimization
projects.description: PostgreSQL database running slow. Need expert to analyze query performance, add proper indexes, and optimize critical queries.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
projects.description: Set up automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions for a Node.js project. Include testing, linting, and deployment to AWS.

tasks.title: Design System Setup
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive design system including color palette, typography scale, spacing system, and reusable component library. This will serve as the foundation for all UI components.
tasks.feedback: Excellent work! The design system is well organized.

tasks.title: Home Screen Redesign
tasks.description: Implement the new home screen design with activity feed, quick action buttons, and personalized recommendations section. Include smooth scroll animations.

tasks.title: Workout Tracker UI
tasks.description: Build the workout tracking interface with animated progress indicators, exercise list with drag-to-reorder, and real-time timer component.
